Getting started with Pega RoboticAutomationIt's easier than ever to get started with Pega Robot Studio The streamlined interface and redesigned functions make building automations intuitive and efficient

The first step in creating automations in Robot Studio is to create a project, which is thecontainer for robotic automations and all components of your solutions •To learn more about the Robot Studio interface, see Overview of the Robot Studio Interface
